name: Meme Machine
description: Meme Machine is a color-matching puzzle action game. Pick your meme and use single- and multi-colored pieces to do battle to crush your opponent!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, and 10 Processor: Dual Core Processor > 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics w/ 1GB VRAM or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
